snippet.title: THE EMPTINESS GAME - play now this psycho-philosophical horror quest
snippet.description:
Official site of the game: http://www.hooliganslab.com/
Play now TheEMPTINESS - http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/28830/the-emptiness/download.html?channel=affiliates&identifier=af13d864ebe5
What people say:
"Scared the pants off of me!"
"Different type of game"
"I want more!"

DISCLAIMER! Before you start playing this psycho-
philosophical quest, we strongly recommend taking the
following Steps to Protect Yourself:

1. Visit a bathroom.
2. Call 911.
3. Put pillows, mattresses and cushions around your place.
4. Install cotton fiber into the walls of your room.
5. Write a will.
But, in general, this is a light and laidback game...

You are locked in a space of your doubts and fears. You are wandering about and looking for a way out, but something terrible stands in your way. You strive for light, but darkness doesn’t let you go. You need to pass a series of tests. Open the doors to break out from the dark corners of your soul. Be persistent and courageous and endure to the very end! 

Warning! The game is not recommended for people with an unhealthy state of mind, nervous disorders or heart disease.
Unique and thrilling psychological quest
Choose between two modes of difficulty
Dark and brooding atmosphere
